summary: CI installation from verdaccio private registry fails silently with no error logs, making it difficult to diagnose the root cause. Logging was added to provide better diagnostic information.
userImpact: Developers experience CI failures with no diagnostic information when installing from private registries.
rootCause: Insufficient logging in the installation process from verdaccio private registry.
proposedFix: Add logging for more information about the installation process.
resolutionDetails: Fixed by adding improved logging to provide diagnostic information during installation failures.
keyQuote: Add logging for more information the next time this happens.
